articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Why have the floods in Europe been so deadly? - Eyewitness News
articles.description: With more than 150 people dead and the toll still climbing, many are asking: How did this happen and why has it been so bad?
articles.content:
With more than 150 people dead and the toll still climbing, many are asking: How did this happen and why has it been so bad?
 BERLIN - Devastating floods in Germany and other parts of western Europe… [+3480 chars]
